## IPointInTimeFinder.find property

An async generator which wraps calls to `SavedObjects.find` and iterates over multiple pages of results using `_pit` and `search_after`<!-- -->. This will open a new Point In Time (PIT), and continue paging until a set of results is received that's smaller than the designated `perPage` size.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
find: () => AsyncGenerator<SavedObjectsFindResponse>;
```
